constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 133 (Thursday, July 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NEWHOUSE:
H.R. 4842.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, clause 2 provides Congress with the
power to ``dispose of and make all needful Rules and
Regulations respecting the Territory and other Property
belonging to the United States.''
[Page H4295]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

title: Tree Spiking Mitigation Act of 2021
